::DevilDuer::

DevilDuer runs into the conflict with Tritan and co., instantly opening fire 
on Tritan.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The Alliance base's computer beeps as firing is detected ouside, hitting 
against the shields. Instantly, autoguns come up, firing at Syco.
